mapper.select: SELECT storageItem.`id` AS id, storageItem.`supplier_party_id` AS supplierPartyId, storageItem.`tag_id` AS tagId, storageItem.`ingredient_id` AS ingredientId, ingredient.`name` AS ingredientName, supplier.`name` AS supplierName, tag.`name` AS tagName, storageItem.`name` AS NAME, storageItem.`item_number` AS itemNumber, storageItem.`assistant_code` AS assistantCode, storageItem.`order_unit_id` AS orderUnitId, storageItem.`storage_unit_id` AS storageUnitId, storageItem.`cost_card_unit_id` AS costCardUnitId, storageItem.`count_unit_id` AS countUnitId, storageItem.`order_to_storage_ratio` AS orderToStorageRatio, storageItem.`storage_to_cost_card_ratio` AS storageToCostCardRatio, storageItem.`max_storage_quantity` AS maxStorageQuantity, storageItem.`min_storage_quantity` AS minStorageQuantity, storageItem.`stock_out_type` AS stockOutType, storageItem.`total_stock_in_quantity` AS totalStockInQuantity, storageItem.`total_stock_in_money` AS totalStockInMoney, storageItem.`last_stock_in_price` AS lastStockInPrice, storageItem.`created_time` AS createdTime, storageItem.`last_modified_time` AS lastModifiedTime FROM `t_storage_item` storageItem LEFT JOIN `t_party_supplier` supplier ON storageItem.`supplier_party_id` = supplier.`party_id` LEFT JOIN `t_tag` tag ON storageItem.`tag_id` = tag.`id` LEFT JOIN `t_ingredient` ingredient ON ingredient.`id` = storage.`ingredient_id` WHERE storageItem.`id` = #{id}
